DataElement.preferredName: Helicobacter Pylori Infection Diagnosis Type Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to indicate the state of the diagnosis of an individual with Helicobacter pylori infection.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any infection ba a bacterial organism that can be assigned to the species Helicobacter pylori._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: A bacterial infection of the stomach, caused by Helicobacter pylori.  It is associated with the development of peptic ulcer and mucosa-associated lymphoid tissue lymphoma.

Property.preferredDefinition: The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of S Ratliff 3/2011 sw.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A country in Western Europe, comprising islands, including the northern one-sixth of the island of Ireland, between the North Atlantic Ocean and the North Sea, northwest of France. The US State Department considers Guernsey, Isle of Man, and Jersey as separate entities, each with its own code. (from CIA World Factbook 2002): The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: A country in western Europe, comprising islands, including England, Scotland, Wales, and the northern one-sixth of the island of Ireland, between the North Atlantic Ocean and the North Sea, northwest of France.
The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A country in North America, bordering both the North Atlantic Ocean and the North Pacific Ocean, between Canada and Mexico. (CIA World Factbook 2002): The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: A country in North America, between Canada and Mexico, bordering both the North Atlantic Ocean and the North Pacific Ocean.
The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).
